subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Bosh scored 34 points and Hassan Whiteside had career highs of 23 points and 16 rebounds off the bench in a win that ended a three-game road skid for Miami.
snippet: Chris Bosh scored 34 points and Hassan Whiteside had career highs of 23 points and 16 rebounds off the bench in a win that ended a three-game road skid for Miami.
